plugins.name: web-tests
plugins.description: Claude Code Skill for web testing and browser automation with Playwright. Auto-detects running dev servers, creates custom test scripts, captures screenshots across viewports, and checks for broken links. Works as a global tool - install once, use in any project. All outputs saved to your working directory's .web-tests/ folder.
features: Auto-detects running dev servers on common ports
Visible browser by default for easy debugging
Saves test scripts and screenshots to .web-tests/
Zero per-repo setup - install once, use everywhere
Custom Playwright automation for any task
Check for broken links and console errors
Works as global tool with CWD pattern
